products.title: BuckleKid Children’s Dining Chair Safety Belt – Protection & Fixed Secure Design, Adjustable & Durable | Essential Safety Harness for Baby Feeding Chairs
products.body_html:
BuckleKid Children’s Dining Chair Safety Belt delivers secure protection with an adjustable, durable design, ensuring safe and worry-free feeding moments. This thoughtfully designed harness keeps little ones safely fixed in their dining chairs, providing peace of mind for parents and comfort for children during every meal.

Smart Design Features

  • Secure protection design keeps your child safely fixed in their dining chair
  • Adjustable strap system grows with your child’s needs
  • Durable, wear-resistant material ensures long-lasting reliability
  • Lightweight and portable for home, travel, or dining out
  • Universal fit compatible with most baby and toddler dining chairs
  • Quick-buckle mechanism makes fastening and removal effortless

Setup and Usage

  1. Attach the belt securely to the dining chair.
  2. Adjust strap length to fit your child comfortably.
  3. Ensure the buckle clicks firmly into place before use.
  4. Clean straps regularly with a damp cloth for hygiene.
  5. Remove and fold for storage or travel convenience.

Product Specifications

  • Material: Premium durable polyester straps with secure plastic buckle
  • Adjustability: Fully adjustable length for babies and toddlers
  • Style: Safety belt with fixed secure design
  • Colors: Classic Neutral, Sky Blue, Rose Pink
  • Suitable for: Babies and toddlers during feeding time
  • Package: 1 adjustable dining chair safety belt

Why Choose This Safety Belt

 

  •  Provides essential safety protection for feeding chairs at home or on the go
  • Adjustable fit grows with your child’s development
  • Lightweight and portable for easy storage or travel
  • Durable construction offers superior reliability over standard straps
  • Universal compatibility ensures it works with most baby dining chairs
  • Designed to give parents peace of mind while keeping mealtimes safe and comfortable

Cozzyii Baby Rocking Chair – Gentle Motion Cradle with Adjustable Comfort & Safety Design

Cozzyii Baby Rocking Chair combines gentle soothing motion with adjustable comfort and safety features to create the perfect relaxation and sleeping solution for infants and toddlers. Thoughtfully engineered, this smart cradle helps calm your baby while supporting safe, restful moments at home.

Smart Design Features

  • Gentle rocking motion mimics a parent's natural sway to soothe infants
  • Adjustable recline settings provide personalized comfort for sleeping or playtime
  • Safety-focused design with secure harness keeps your baby protected
  • Lightweight yet sturdy construction ensures stability and easy mobility around the home
  • Compact, space-saving design fits seamlessly into modern living spaces
  • Soft, breathable seat materials offer long-lasting comfort and easy cleaning

Setup and Usage

  1. Unfold chair and lock all safety joints securely in place
  2. Adjust recline angle to suit your baby's comfort needs
  3. Ensure safety harness is properly secured before use
  4. Activate gentle rocking motion for soothing relaxation
  5. Clean seating area regularly with a damp cloth for hygiene
  6. Fold flat for convenient storage or transport when not in use

Product Specifications

  • Dimensions: 92x60x55cm when fully expanded
  • Style: Gentle rocking cradle with adjustable recline

products.title: Go-Bag Baby Chair Cover | Portable Feeding Harness
products.body_html:
A busy household often struggles with mealtimes when a proper seating solution isn't available. Balancing a child on the lap or improvising with unsuitable chairs can quickly turn feeding into a frustrating routine. Spilled food, restless movements, and unstable setups make the experience messy and stressful. The Baby Dining Chair Bag Portable Child Chair Cover Baby Out solves this problem by providing a lightweight, secure, and adaptable seating option that keeps mealtime organized wherever families go.

The Go-Bag Baby Chair Cover Portable Feeding Harness is engineered for families who are always on the move. Its chair cover transforms nearly any standard chair into a safe and comfortable seat for children. Its compact, travel-friendly design makes it perfect for dining out, visiting relatives, or simply enjoying meals at home without bulky furniture. With simplicity and convenience built into every detail, it helps create smoother routines and calmer mealtimes.





WHY IT MAKES A DIFFERENCE BABY DINING CHAIR BAG


✅ TRAVEL-FRIENDLY DESIGN—It folds into a compact bag that's easy to carry in a diaper bag or purse. This makes it perfect for family outings, restaurants, or vacations.

✅ UNIVERSAL FIT – Adjustable straps allow it to attach securely to most dining chairs. This ensures that children always have a safe and stable place to sit, regardless of location.





✅ SECURE & SAFE – Built-in harness keeps children firmly in place during mealtime. Parents can relax knowing their child is seated safely without slipping or climbing out.

✅ COMFORTABLE SEATING – Soft, fabric construction keeps children comfortable while seated. Longer meals or outings become easier when kids feel relaxed and supported.





✅ EASY TO CLEAN – Machine-washable material makes cleanup effortless after spills or messes. This keeps the chair cover fresh and ready for subsequent use without hassle.



SIMPLE TO USE BABY DINING CHAIR BAG


1. Unfold the chair bag and place it on a dining chair.

2. Adjust the straps for a snug fit.

3. Secure the harness around the child.

4. Enjoy meals anywhere with ease and peace of mind.


Research shows that over 65% of parents feel stressed when dining out due to the lack of proper child seating. Makeshift solutions such as holding children on laps or using oversized chairs often result in constant interruptions, food mess, and safety concerns, turning family meals into stressful experiences.

The Baby Dining Chair Bag Portable Child Chair Cover Baby Out eliminates these frustrations with its travel-ready design, secure harness, and easy-to-clean fabric. Families who use it report calmer outings, safer mealtimes, and the confidence to enjoy meals together—at home, in restaurants, or on the go.



 PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Cloth

Style: Portable (Small)

Recommended Age: 6 months - 3 years old

Chair Compatibility: Fits chairs with a back width of 35-50 cm and height of 35-55 cm

Colors: Yellow Orange

products.title: Layette Durable High Chair Seat Pad | Washable Padded Cushion
products.body_html:
A common frustration for parents is the constant need to clean a grimy, stained high chair. A person may face a never-ending cycle of scrubbing and sanitizing without a removable and washable seat cover. This challenge can lead to frustration and feeling overwhelmed by the mess. This difficulty in maintenance often leads to a less-than-hygienic dining environment, highlighting the crucial need for a simple solution like a dedicated baby high chair cushion cover.


The Layette cushion cover is ideal, providing a supportive, hygienic, and attractive addition to a high chair. Its plush, padded seat makes every meal comfortable, while its durable, waterproof material and machine-washable design make cleanup effortless. This approach to mealtime makes a baby more comfortable and ensures the high chair stays clean and ready for subsequent use.



 





 REASONS WHY A LAYETTE CUSHION COVER IS AN ESSENTIAL


✅ SUPERIOR COMFORT: The Layette is made from soft, padded material that provides a plush and comfortable seat for a baby. The added support and cushioning encourage a baby to sit longer, making mealtimes more relaxed.

✅ EASY CLEANUP: The waterproof surface of this baby high chair cushion cover makes it simple to wipe away spills and crumbs. The cover is machine-washable for bigger messes, ensuring it is always hygienic and fresh.




✅ UNIVERSAL FIT: Designed to fit most standard baby high chairs, the Layette is a versatile and practical accessory. It's a quick and easy way to upgrade an existing high chair without buying a new one.

✅ SECURE AND STYLISH: With its non-slip design, the cushion stays firmly in place, and its stylish patterns and colors add a fun touch to a dining space, making mealtime more visually appealing.




✅ EXTENDED CHAIR LIFE: By protecting the original high chair fabric or material, the Layette cushion cover helps prolong the life of a high chair, keeping it in excellent condition for years to come.



HOW TO USE THE LAYETTE CUSHION COVER


1. Attach the Cushion: Drape the cushion cover over the high chair seat. The secure design keeps it from sliding.

2. Adjust the Straps: The cushion has openings for the safety harness, ensuring a baby remains secure while seated.

3. Seat the Baby: Place a baby in the chair and enjoy a clean mealtime.

4. Remove and Wash: After a messy meal, a person can easily remove the cover and place it in the washing machine for a thorough clean.



The challenge of keeping a high chair clean, the discomfort a baby may experience on a hard surface, and the desire for a more organized mealtime often trigger stress and chaos. Without an adequate cushion cover, a person may spend more time cleaning than enjoying precious moments with a child, leading to frustration.


A proper Layette baby high chair cushion cover provides a simple and elegant solution to these problems. Its washable design and comfortable padding make it a valuable addition to any high chair. Each feature enhances a person's peace of mind, reduces mealtime stress, and improves a baby's comfort, making this cushion an indispensable tool for anyone seeking a more convenient and effective way to manage a person's dining experience.



  PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: 100% Pure Cotton

Purpose: High chair cushion cover, shopping cart protection

Features: Portable, antibacterial, and can be carried

Package Size: 260 x 380 x 80 mm

products.title: NeveMat - Adventure Awaits with Inflatable Sleeping Pads for Campers
products.body_html:
"NeveMat turns outdoor nights transforming rugged terrains to become comfortable and guarantee restful sleep. Cold and uncomfortable ground becomes a thing of the past, allowing deep rest and renewed energy. Rapid inflation and superior insulation feature exceed expectations, guaranteeing campers comfort and is a must-have addition for any backpacking adventure."

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Morris Hugo
✅ Verified Buyer

 

Sleeping on cold uneven ground during backpacking trips often leads to discomfort, less energy, and poor sleep quality. Adding to these problems is the bulk and weight of traditional camping sleeping pads, making transport another chore. It diminishes the enjoyment of camping adventure giving campers constant struggle, inadequate insulation from the elements, and painful pressure, leading to fatigue and more frustration. Feeling unprepared is an understatement with these issues highlighting the need of having a comfortable inflatable sleeping pad.

NeveMat’s Inflatable Sleeping Pads come with advanced insulation technology, ergonomic air cell design, and a rapid inflation valve perfect for comfort and warmth. The durable and lightweight build makes NeveMat compact reducing the effort needed when carrying it. High-quality construction of the sleeping pad makes it comfortably assuring for resting across different weather conditions and terrain. Get the confident inflatable sleeping pad needed for reduced discomfort and restorative sleep, guaranteeing an enjoyable, smoother camping experience.

 

REASONS WHY NEVEMAT INFLATABLE SLEEPING PADS WILL CHANGE CAMPING EXPERIENCES

✅ APEX COMFORT AND SUPPORT: Thanks to the air-cell design conforming on the body’s contour, NeveMat provides exceptional and quality cushioning and support. The pad guarantees a comfortable and stable sleeping surface, perfect for deep, restorative rest when backpacking.

✅ COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT COMPATIBILITY: NeveMat pads are built with lightweight material making packing it down to a remarkable size easy. The compact portability guarantees easy to carry, reducing load for hikers and saving valuable space.


✅ DURABLE AND PUNCTURE-RESISTANT: Built from tear-resistant and strong materials, NeveMat withstands the rigors of backpacking environments with ease. Thanks to the durable build, the pad guarantees long-lasting performance by minimizing risk of punctures.

✅ RAPID INFLATION AND DEFLATION: Thanks to the innovative valve system, NeveMat allows for effortless and quick inflation, within a few breaths or with the help of an integrated pump. Deflating the pad is as fast, enabling a rapid packing, maximizing outdoor adventure.


✅ SUPERIOR INLFATION DURING SEASONS: Thanks to an innovative insulation technology, NeveMat effectively blocks cold air from the ground, providing comfort and warmth during cold seasons. It makes the pad a perfect solution for multi-season camping.

 

HOW TO USE NEVEMAT INFLATABLE SLEEPING PADS

1. Start by Unrolling and Unfolding: Unroll NeveMat at the desired sleeping spot, and check the valve is easily accessible.

2. Inflate Speedily: Next step is opening the inflation valve and blow air or use an integrated pump until the sleeping pad reaches the desired firmness.

3. Enjoy Calming Sleep: Lay down on the inflated pad and watch as the ergonomic design cradles the body for a comfortable night’s rest.

4. Deflate after Use and Pack: Finish by deflating the pad, open the valve, rolling the pad from the opposite end, push air out and finally fold and roll it to the compact storage size.

 

The discomfort of having to sleep on clod ground, frustration of bulky sleeping gear, and uncomfortable sleep patterns trigger body aches, exhaustion, and fatigue. Having to rely on inadequate sleeping solutions increases discomfort and at the same time, reducing the enjoyment one would experience of outdoor adventures.

NeveMat’s inflatable sleeping pads come with an air-cell design, ergonomic body fit shape, rapid inflation coupled with superior inflation. Built in durable construction helps withstand the adversity of outdoor adventure, with the lightweight design making the mat easily portable. Each feature brings enhanced sleep quality, promoting warmth during cold nights. NeveMat is a perfect tool for any outdoor adventurer seeking improved comfort and lasting energy.

Unfolded Size: 225cm*70cm
Package Size: 260*100*100(mm) 290*120*120(mm)
Color: Navy Blue, Army Green, Dark Blue, Royal Blue, Orange, Hemp Gray, Camouflage
Length: 190*60cm

Frequently Asked Questions about NeveMat Inflatable Sleeping Pads

What’s the Main Advantage of Using NeveMat?

Superior comfort, not forgetting insulation and thickness of NeveMat compared to other pads makes it a perfect choice. It provides far much better cushioning from uneven ground and guarantees effective protection from cold.

How Quickly Can NeveMat be Deflated and Inflated?

Designed with rapid deflation and inflation in mind, most models come with an integrated pump allowing for a rapid packing and unpacking in a matter of minutes. Saving valuable time is another feature making NeveMat a better option.

Are NeveMat Pads Durable and Resistant to Punctures?

Absolutely! Built from durable and tear-resistant materials, NeveMat is designed to withstand the asperities of outdoor adventure. The pad is built to be puncture proof and often comes with a repair kit, just in case of accidents.

Can NeveMat be used in Extremely Cold Conditions?

Yes! Thanks to the varying-R values, NeveMat offers excellent warmth, making them suitable for cold weather, making winter camping comfortable.

How Compact is NeveMat when Packed?

Designed with portability in mind, the pad packs down to a remarkable size, with most users comparing it to a water bottle, making them easy to carry inside a backpack.

products.title: Padded Rainbow Seat Cover | Baby High Chair & Trolley Pad
products.body_html:
The failure of lacking a straightforward feeding solution often limits a family's freedom to enjoy a meal out. Relying on a restaurant's high chairs can be risky, as they are usually worn, uncleaned, or unavailable. This struggle to find a safe space for a child to dine highlights the critical need for a personal, hygienic, and easy-to-carry feeding seat. The Rainbowe is the answer to this problem, designed to offer a peace-of-mind feeding experience, anywhere.


Introducing Rainbowe dining chair trolley baby seat which is more than just a seat; it is a compact, all-in-one solution that transforms any standard chair into a safe and secure high chair. With its smart design and durable materials, this baby seat rainbow cushion provides a stable and safe place for a baby to sit while being incredibly easy to pack and carry.


 



REASONS WHY A RAINBOWE CUSHION IS A GREAT INVESTMENT


✅ PORTABILITY AND CONVENIENCE: The Rainbowe is designed to fold into a compact size, making it effortless to carry. It can fit in a diaper bag, purse, or stroller, ensuring a safe seat is always on hand.

✅ UNIVERSAL ADAPTABILITY: This versatile dining chair trolley baby seat fits securely onto most standard dining chairs, transforming them into a safe and supportive seat for a baby. It is perfect for restaurants, family gatherings, or visiting a friend’s house.


 


✅ SAFETY FIRST: The Rainbowe features a secure harness system that keeps a baby snug and in place, preventing slips and falls. The reliable straps provide peace of mind, knowing a child is safe and secure.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN: Made with durable and washable fabric, the Rainbowe is a breeze to clean after messy meals. A person can wipe it down or toss it in the washing machine, ensuring a hygienic space for a baby to eat.


 


✅ COMFORT AND SUPPORT: The padded back and seat provide a soft and comfortable place for a baby to sit, making mealtimes more enjoyable for a little one.


 

HOW TO USE THE RAINBOWE CUSHION


1. Unfold the Harness: Unfold the compact harness to reveal the full seat.

2. Secure to a Chair: Place the harness over the back of a chair and secure it using the adjustable straps and buckles.

3. Place the Baby: Seat a baby in the chair, ensuring the harness is securely fastened.

4. Enjoy the Meal: The stable and safe seat allows for an enjoyable mealtime for everyone.

5. Pack Up: After use, unbuckle the cover, wipe it clean, and fold it back into its portable size.



The lack of a suitable and safe feeding option can hinder the desire for a spontaneous trip to a restaurant or a simple visit with friends. This lack of a dining chair trolley baby seat can make a person feel tied to a home, stressed about a child's safety, and limited in their ability to enjoy a meal outside a familiar environment.

A Rainbowe baby safety seat provides a solution by giving a person the freedom to go anywhere with the confidence that a safe, clean, and comfortable seat is always available. Its easy-to-use design and compact portability make it a valuable tool for any family, enhancing convenience and reducing mealtime stress.


 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Polyester fiber with a polyurethane sponge lining

Dimensions: 80 x 34 x 1 cm

Recommended Age: 0-3 years

Applicable Season: All four seasons

Care Instructions: Hand wash only; do not machine wash or expose to sun

✅ UNIVERSAL ADAPTABILITY: This versatile portable baby dining chair seat fits securely onto most standard dining chairs, transforming them into safe and supportive baby seats. It is perfect for restaurants, family gatherings, or visiting a friend's house.


 


✅ SAFETY FIRST: Featuring a secure harness system, the Siddhar keeps a baby snug and in place, preventing slips and falls. The reliable straps provide peace of mind, knowing a child is safe and secure.

✅ EASY TO CLEAN: Made with durable and washable fabric, the Siddhar is a breeze to clean after messy meals. A person can wipe it down or toss it in the washing machine, ensuring a hygienic space for a baby to eat.




✅ COMFORT AND SUPPORT: The padded back and seat provide a soft and comfortable place for a baby to sit, making mealtimes more enjoyable for a little one.



HOW TO USE THE SIDDHAR SEAT HARNESS


1. Unfold the Harness: Unfold the compact harness to reveal the full seat.

2. Secure to a Chair: Place the harness over the back of a chair and secure it using the adjustable straps and buckles.

3. Place the Baby: Seat a baby in the chair, ensuring the harness is securely fastened.

4. Enjoy the Meal: The stable and safe seat allows for an enjoyable mealtime for everyone.

5. Pack Up: After use, unbuckle the cover, wipe it clean, and fold it back into its portable size.



The lack of a suitable and safe feeding option can hinder the desire for a spontaneous trip to a restaurant or a simple visit with friends. This lack of a portable baby dining chair seat can make a person feel tied to a home, stressed about a child's safety, and limited in their ability to enjoy a meal outside a familiar environment.



A Siddhar baby safety harness provides a solution by allowing a person to go anywhere with the confidence that a safe, clean, and comfortable seat is always available. Its easy-to-use design and compact portability make it a valuable tool for any family, enhancing convenience and reducing mealtime stress.

products.title: Siddhar Portable Baby Dining Seat On the Go Safety Harness
products.body_html:
Traveling with a little one often means improvising at mealtimes—using laps, unstable booster seats, or restaurant highchairs that aren't always clean or safe. These situations can turn dining into a stressful balancing act rather than a moment of ease. The Portable Dining Chair Bag is designed to solve that problem, giving parents a secure, compact, and reliable seating option no matter where they are. 

With its innovative design, the Portable Dining Chair Bag combines convenience with comfort, ensuring your child always has a safe seat at the table. Its lightweight and foldable build makes it easy to carry, while the sturdy structure provides stability for your little one. Mealtime becomes less about worry and more about enjoying food and family togetherness.

 


WHAT MAKES THE PORTABLE DINING CHAIR BAG DIFFERENT


✅ ALL-IN-ONE FUNCTION—It acts as a storage bag and a baby dining chair, reducing the need for multiple bulky items. This makes it ideal for parents who love efficiency and organization.

✅ FOLDABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT—It is compact enough to carry in one hand or slip into a travel bag. Parents can set it up anywhere, making dining on the go seamless and stress-free.



✅ SECURE DESIGN – Equipped with strong straps and safety buckles, the Portable Dining Chair Bag keeps children stable and comfortable during meals. This reassures parents that their little ones are safe even in unfamiliar environments.

✅ COMFORTABLE SEATING – Padded construction gives kids proper support while sitting. This helps them stay at the table longer, reducing fussiness and making mealtime more enjoyable.



✅ EASY TO CLEAN—The Portable Dining Chair Bag is made of wipeable materials that resist stains and spills. Parents save time cleaning, keeping the Bag fresh for the next outing. 

 

SIMPLE TO USE PORTABLE DINING CHAIR BAG


 

1. Unfold the Portable Dining Chair Bag and secure it to a chair.

2. Fasten the safety straps snugly around your child.

3. Store small items in its built-in pockets.

4. Fold it back up into a bag when mealtime is over. 

Studies show that over 60% of parents find eating out with young children stressful due to a lack of safe and hygienic seating. Many report avoiding family meals at restaurants or friends' houses altogether because of the hassle.

Parents who use the Portable Dining Chair Bag experience smoother dining anywhere, with peace of mind knowing their child is safe, comfortable, and seated correctly. Its versatility, portability, and easy-care design make it a must-have for families who want to simplify mealtime without sacrificing convenience.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Oxford Cloth, Nylon, Sponge

Dimensions: 30cm x 25cm x 8cm

Recommended Age: 1-3 years old

Colors: Sky Blue, Light Yellow, Pink (with a randomly selected hem color)

Package Size: 300 x 250 x 80 mm

products.title: Upalise Compact Travel Booster Seat Portable High Chair Harness
products.body_html:
A busy household often struggles with mealtimes when a proper seating solution isn't available. Balancing a child on the lap or improvising with unsuitable chairs quickly turns feeding into a stressful task. Food spills onto the floor, plates slide around, and both parent and child feel unsettled. The Baby Dining Chair Stool Children's Chair Back Seat Baby Dining Table Chair transforms this situation, offering a safe, compact, structured seat that makes every meal smoother and more enjoyable.


Baby Booster Chair & Stool Multi-Use Toddler Seat is engineered to combine comfort with practicality. This dining chair provides stability and ease of use for everyday routines. Its lightweight and adaptable design ensures it fits seamlessly at home, in restaurants, or while visiting family. Instead of worrying about spills and safety, mealtime becomes more about connection and less about cleanup.



 



WHY IT MAKES A DIFFERENCE BABY DINING CHAIR STOOL

 

✅ MULTIPURPOSE FUNCTION – Works as both a dining chair and stool, reducing the need for multiple pieces of furniture. This makes it ideal for small spaces and growing families.

✅ FOLDABLE & EASY TO CARRY – The chair folds quickly into a compact size, making it portable and storage-friendly. Parents can easily bring it along for trips, dining out, or family visits.




✅ SECURE & STABLE DESIGN – Built with durable materials and anti-slip features, it ensures children remain safe while eating or sitting. This provides peace of mind during independent feeding.

✅ ERGONOMIC SUPPORT – A comfortable back seat supports healthy posture and keeps children calm and focused. This helps reduce fussiness and encourages longer, more enjoyable meals.




 ✅ QUICK TO CLEAN – The smooth, stain-resistant surface is designed for effortless wipe-downs. This saves time and keeps mealtime stress-free, even with messy eaters.

 

SIMPLE TO USE BABY DINING CHAIR STOOL


1. Unfold the chair and secure it in place.
2. Attach or adjust the seating as needed.
3. Position at the table or preferred spot.
4. Seat the child and enjoy a calm, stress-free meal.

Studies show that nearly 70% of parents find mealtime difficult without a proper child dining chair. Makeshift seating arrangements often lead to spills, poor posture, and constant interruptions, leaving parents frustrated and children distracted during meals.

The Baby Dining Chair Stool Children's Chair Back Seat Baby Dining Table Chair removes these challenges with its secure, ergonomic, and easy-to-clean design. Families highlight how its portability, stability, and comfort create smoother routines, turning daily meals into enjoyable and stress-free experiences for parents and children.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Plastic

Weight: 1500g

Style: Simple and modern

Colors: Liquid Gold, Sinlo Silver

Package Size: 350 x 220 x 360 mm

Package Options:

Style 1: Sound PVC cushion

Style 2: Sounding PVC upholstery + dinner plate

Style 3: Sound PVC cushion + dinner plate + transparent dinner plate

Style 4: Sounding PVC cushion + dinner plate + transparent dinner plate + 1 spare PU cushion

Style 5: Comfortable PU cushion

Style 7: Comfortable PU cushion + dinner plate + transparent dinner plate
